Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist No.1 of Wd.3 -- 10.31 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD DISTRICT NO. 1 OF WARD 3 PROPOSITION
 (TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 10.31 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING ROADS IN THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 1 of Ward 3 of the Parish of St. Landry, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a ten and thirty-one hundredths (10.31) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $136,900 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating roads in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No.2 of Wd.1 -- 10 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD DISTRICT NO. 2 OF WARD 1 PROPOSITION
 (TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR, 10 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING PUBLIC ROADS AND BRIDGES, INCLUDING THE PURCHASE OF EQUIPMENT THEREFOR.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 2 of Ward 1 of the Parish of St. Landry, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $251,200 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating public roads and bridges within the District, including the purchase of equipment therefor?

Race.SpecificTitle: Road Dist. No.12 of Wd.2 -- 5.12 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
ROAD DISTRICT NO. 12 OF WARD 2 PROPOSITION
(TAX RENEWAL)

SUMMARY:  10 YEAR 5.12 MILLS PROPERTY TAX RENEWAL FOR CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING ROADS IN THE DISTRICT.
Race.FullText: Shall Road District No. 12 of Ward 2 of the Parish of St. Landry, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a five and twelve hundredths (5.12) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $118,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating roads in the District?
